author: wn.com
title: UIC ad campaign tells public ‘how great this university is’ (University of Illinois at Chicago) ...
text: ( Source : University of Illinois at Chicago ) UIC students are featured in a new advertising campaign on CTA buses, trains and platforms and at O'Hare International Airport . The ads also appear on Facebook and the Pandora music streaming
